org.csdgn.maru

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.csdgn.maru.Files

  • public class Files
extends java.lang.Object
    A number of useful static methods to make working with IO much easier. Many of the methods purposely ignore exceptions and return a sentinel value on failure.
    Author:
    Robert Maupin
